items.name: Big Commerce
items.description: Big Commerce is a leading e-commerce platform providing businesses with the tools to build, innovate, and grow their online presence.

items.name: Bold Commerce
items.description: Bold Commerce offers e-commerce solutions that enable brands to create customized and scalable online stores.

items.name: commercetools
items.description: commercetools provides a headless commerce platform that supports flexible and scalable e-commerce architectures.

items.name: Kibo
items.description: Kibo offers an omnichannel commerce platform that supports unified shopping experiences across channels.

items.name: Nacelle
items.description: Nacelle provides a headless commerce solution that enhances site performance and scalability.

items.name: NewStore
items.description: NewStore offers a mobile retail platform that integrates online and offline shopping experiences.

items.name: VTEX
items.description: VTEX provides a collaborative commerce platform that supports complex and large-scale e-commerce operations.

items.name: Emporix
items.description: Emporix offers a cloud-native commerce platform designed for modern e-commerce needs.

items.name: Commerce Layer
items.description: Commerce Layer provides a headless commerce platform that allows businesses to manage global e-commerce operations.

items.name: Brink Commerce
items.description: Brink Commerce offers a headless commerce solution designed for high-growth and high-performance e-commerce businesses.
